info.name: Ecommerce API - Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Ecommerce Backend with User Management, Product Management, Categories, Attributes, Variants, and Options. Updated for singular table names.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account. Creates entry in singular `user` table.

exec: // Set in both collection and environment variables
console.log('❌ Token not found in response');
console.log('❌ Login failed with status:', pm.response.code);

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token.
Refresh authentication token.
Logout user and invalidate token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and token management.

request.description: Get current user's profile from `user` table.
Update user profile information.
Change user password.
List users. Sellers can only see users in their seller scope. Admins can see all users.

item.name: Address Management

request.description: Get all addresses for current user from `address` table (singular).
Add new address. Uses `street` and `zipCode` fields (not address_line1/postal_code).
Update existing address.
Delete address by ID.
Set address as default.

item.description: Address management endpoints. Note: Uses singular `address` table with `street` and `zipCode` fields.

item.name: Categories

request.description: Get all categories from singular `category` table. Supports hierarchical structure.
Get single category by ID.
Get child categories by parent ID.
Get all attributes for a category including inherited from parent categories.
Create new category. Requires seller authentication.
Update existing category.
Delete category by ID.

item.description: Category management endpoints. Uses singular `category` table with `isGlobal` and `sellerId` fields for multi-tenancy.

item.name: Attributes

request.description: Get all attribute definitions from `attribute_definition` table.
Get single attribute definition by ID.
Create new attribute definition. Note: uses `key` field for unique identifier.
Update existing attribute definition.
Delete attribute definition.
Link attribute to category. Creates entry in `category_attribute` table with `attributeDefinitionId`.
Unlink attribute from category.

item.description: Attribute definition management. Uses singular `attribute_definition` table with `key`, `name`, `unit`, and `allowedValues` fields.

item.name: Products

request.description: Get all products from singular `product` table with pagination.
Get product details with variants and attributes.
Search products with filters.
Get available filters for products in a category.
Get related products based on category and attributes.
Create new product. Requires seller authentication.
Update existing product.
Delete product by ID.

item.description: Product management endpoints. Uses singular `product` table with simplified structure (no extra fields like status, isActive, etc.).

item.name: Product Options

request.description: Get all available options for a product (Color, Size, Storage, etc.) from `product_option` table.
Create new product option.
Update existing product option.
Delete product option.
Bulk update multiple product options at once.

item.description: Product options management (for variant selection like Color, Size, Storage). Uses singular `product_option` table.

item.name: Product Variants

request.description: List/filter variants across all products. Useful for home page, search results, etc.
Find specific variant by option values. Links through `variant_option_value` table.
Get variant details by ID from `product_variant` table.
Create new product variant. Requires seller authentication.
Update existing variant.
Bulk update multiple variants at once.
Update only stock quantity for a variant.
Delete product variant.

item.description: Product variant management. Uses singular `product_variant` table with `variant_option_value` junction table for linking options.

request.description: Create new product option.
Create new product option.
Create new product option.
Create new product option.
Bulk update multiple option values at once.

item.name: Product Attributes

request.description: Get all attributes for a product.
Add a new attribute to a product.
Update an existing product attribute.
Bulk update product attributes.
Delete a product attribute.

item.description: Product attribute management endpoints for managing product-specific attributes.

item.name: Inventory Management
Locations

request.description: Create a new inventory location (warehouse, store, etc.). Requires seller authentication. Location types: WAREHOUSE, STORE, DROPSHIP.
Get all locations for the authenticated seller with pagination and filters.
Get a specific location by ID with address details.
Get all locations with inventory summary (product count, variant count, stock levels, low stock alerts). API 1: Location Overview.
Get products with inventory summary at a specific location. API 2: Product Inventory at Location. Filters: stockStatus (IN_STOCK, LOW_STOCK, OUT_OF_STOCK), search, categoryId, lowStockOnly.

Get variant-level inventory for a product at a specific location. API 3: Variant Details. Shows SKU, variant options, quantity, reserved, available, stock status. Sort by: sku, variantName, quantity, reservedQuantity, availableQuantity, threshold.
Update an existing location. All fields are optional (partial update supported).
Delete a location. Fails if location has existing inventory records.

item.description: Location management endpoints for warehouses, stores, and dropship locations.

item.name: Inventory Operations

request.description: List inventories with filters. Filter by locationId, variantId, stockStatus (IN_STOCK, LOW_STOCK, OUT_OF_STOCK), productId.

Manage inventory quantity. Creates inventory record if not exists. Transaction types: PURCHASE (add stock), SALE (reduce stock), ADJUSTMENT (add/remove with direction), RESERVED (reserve for order), RELEASED (release reservation), TRANSFER_IN, TRANSFER_OUT, RETURN, DAMAGE, REFRESH (set absolute).

body.raw:
{
  "variantId": 1,
  "locationId": 1,
  "quantity": 10,
  "transactionType": "ADJUSTMENT",
  "direction": "ADD",
  "reason": "Found extra stock during audit",
  "note": "Physical count adjustment"
}

request.description: Adjust inventory with ADD direction. Requires direction field (ADD or REMOVE) for ADJUSTMENT type.

body.raw:
{
  "variantId": 1,
  "locationId": 1,
  "quantity": 5,
  "transactionType": "ADJUSTMENT",
  "direction": "REMOVE",
  "reason": "Stock discrepancy found during audit",
  "note": "Physical count adjustment"
}

request.description: Adjust inventory with REMOVE direction.
Reserve stock for an order. Increases reserved_quantity. Reference required.
Release previously reserved stock (order cancelled). Decreases reserved_quantity.
Record a sale. Reduces both quantity and reserved_quantity.

body.raw:
{
  "variantId": 1,
  "locationId": 1,
  "quantity": 1,
  "transactionType": "ADJUSTMENT",
  "direction": "ADD",
  "threshold": 20,
  "reason": "Updating low stock threshold for holiday season"
}

request.description: Update the low stock threshold. Can be combined with any transaction type.
Bulk inventory management. Process multiple inventory operations in a single request. Max 100 items per request. Returns success/failure count and individual results.
Get inventory for a specific variant across all locations. Shows quantity, reserved, available, and stock status per location.
Get all inventory records at a specific location.
List inventory transactions with filters. Filter by variantId, locationId, type, referenceId, date range.

item.description: Inventory operations for managing stock levels, reservations, and transactions.

item.name: Reservation

request.description: Create a new inventory reservation for an order. Reserves stock from available inventory.
Update reservation status. Status can be CANCELLED (releases reserved stock) or COMPLETED (converts reservation to sale).

item.description: Inventory reservation endpoints for managing stock reservations for orders.
Inventory management endpoints for locations, stock levels, reservations, and transaction history.
